hiveArticle.title: When the Sun Sets
hiveArticle.body:
When the sun sets it creates a romantic environment and you can see that there are so many colours. It is not only for the humans that love the sunset, but you can see so many birds are really enjoying the weather.

### A Lovely Scene

![IMG_20171103_173506-2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509724488/dta5bzwodamomqsl2zup.jpg)

### A Closer Look

![IMG_20171103_173445-2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509724446/bzo4o5gvad9tbtyjixbk.jpg)

<hr>
